name: Mysterious New City
description: When you wake up, you are completely unfamiliar with the city in front of you, but the residents of the city say that you are inextricably connected with the city. How to operate the completely disordered front and back in the game? Where to find the three missing memories? With these questions, you start your journey in a muddled way.......(*^_^*) WASD controls player direction However, please note that the directions in the city of the game are not as usual. The directions here are divided according to the whole city map. Can you conceive the direction logic of the whole city map in your mind? You can try to turn and walk at the starting point to adapt, and find those three memories!
